Posts.EditableText: hey Opulus, I asked a similar question before, viewtopic.php?f=10&t=3973 . The gist of the answer is that to have two languages out of the box with Quest you need two game files. But you could code a different way to put two languages in one game. Yes you can make a menu. How do you want it displayed? You mean like a main menu screen before the game starts?
